text:
Quick poll for this remarkable mindshare! Are you using `AI` within your development pipeline today? If so, where do you find it the most impactful/valuable? React with an emoji

> Unit | integration test generation :test_tube:
> Generating code functions :cd:
> Generating test data :chart_with_upwards_trend:
> Writing PR descriptions :git:
> Searching documentation :mag:
> Explore APIs :robot_face:
> CLI commands :computer:
> Documenting code/API :technologist:
> I don't use AI :x:
